text: I’m not aware of a built in way to do that in HubSpot. As best practices I crawl my sites with ScreamingFrog each year and monitor them weekly with Ahrefs to keep them clean.
Thanks for the reply, <@UTQQ4TXCH>. I like that approach. The next issue, though, is that HubSpot also hides how many times a 301 is used.
I’m forever doing maintenance. In some areas, I wish using HubSpot was more like running a WordPress instance. This is definitely one of them.
Tools such as Ahrefs will show all chains.
Yes, I use Ahrefs for that purpose.
HubSpot users would def benefit from better internal monitoring tools.
